name: RadioMv(Spanish)
0: ”Alexa, play Radio M. V. Spanish Station”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: radio m. v. spanish station
des:
RadioMv is a Online Christian Radio Network. Hundreds of Slavic, Spanish, German and American s are listening RadioMv around the world. Since it's launch in February 2006 the program has been played in more than 136 countries of the world. "You give them something to eat." ~ Luke 9: 13

Here are the available Spanish stations that you could choose from:
- Main Station
- New Testament Station
- Old Testament Station

RadioMv also streams in English, Slavic and German language. Just say:
- "Alexa, play RadioMv English Station" for English
- "Alexa, play RadioMv Slavic Station" for Slavic
- "Alexa, play RadioMv German Station" for German

..or search in your Alexa App the keywords:
"RadioMv English"
"RadioMv Slavic"
"RadioMv German"

DISCLAIMER: The skill content is in Spanish Language.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
